dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...dollarization of bank deposits has, uh, effectively halted. That's a massive win, right? A massive win? Because of celebrity endorsements, A? Seriously? It shows, like, the confidence in the Tenge is up, you know? The policies are working.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...dollarization of bank deposits has, uh, effectively halted. That's a massive win, right? A massive win? Because of celebrity endorsements, A? Seriously? It shows, like, the confidence in the Tenge is up, you know? The policies are working.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Situation in the domestic financial market indicates stabilization in the currency preferences of banking depositors dollarization of bank deposits has stopped.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It shows theyâ€™re desperate! And businesses are still reluctant to engage with external stakeholders.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It shows they're desperate! And businesses are still reluctant to engage with external stakeholders.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Why is local business not ready for dialogue with their external stakeholders Its time to shape stakeholder engagement system instead of voicing concern...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But the base rate, steady at 17%, that's cushioning the impact for local businesses.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the base rate, steady at seventeen percent, that's cushioning the impact for local businesses.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The National Bank of Kazakhstan has decided to keep the base rate unchanged at 17% with a symmetric interest rate corridor of +/- 2 percentage points.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Cushioning? At 17%? That's not cushioning, that's strangling them slowly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Cushioning? At seventeen percent? That's not cushioning, that's strangling them slowly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's pragmatic, influenced by strong lobbying, Host_B. They're listening.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's pragmatic, influenced by strong lobbying, Host_B. They're listening.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The decision on the base rate was made taking into account risks for price stability, financial stability and economic growth outlook.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're bowing to pressure, that's what it sounds like. Weak leadership, not proactive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're bowing to pressure, that's what it sounds like. Weak leadership, not proactive.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They're committed to long-term strategies, infrastructure, fighting inflation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're committed to long-term strategies, infrastructure, fighting inflation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The decision on the base rate was made taking into account risks for price stability, financial stability and economic growth outlook.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Empty rhetoric, um, while inflation sits at 15.2 percent!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Empty rhetoric, um, while inflation sits at fifteen point two percent!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In February 2016 headline inflation reached 15.2% year-on-year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's expected to decelerate rapidly, though. Six to eight percent by December!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's expected to decelerate rapidly, though. Six to eight percent by December!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The National Bank of Kazakhstan expects that headline inflation will slow down in the second half of the year and it will approach to the upper boundary of the objective range of 6-8 percent by the end of 2016.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Expected! From 15.2? That's an optimistic forecast, not a guarantee.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Expected! From fifteen point two? That's an optimistic forecast, not a guarantee.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They're monitoring international energy prices, like, a comprehensive approach.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're monitoring international energy prices, like, a comprehensive approach.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So they're relying on other countries to fix their mess? That's not confidence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So they're relying on other countries to fix their mess? That's not confidence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's, uh, strategic risk management.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's, uh, strategic risk management.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a prayer, Host_A, a prayer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a prayer, Host_A, a prayer.
